-- Reading all csv files in the folder using *

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


-- read from subfolders using **

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


-- Selecting specific file paths

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ('trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/*.csv',
        'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=03/*.csv'),
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]



-- Multiple Wild Cards

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]


-- Getting file name from where data was selected

SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
-- File Data Analysis

SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS result_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filename()
ORDER BY [result].filename()


-- Read only specific file details

SELECT TOP 100
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    COUNT(1) AS result_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filename() IN ('green_tripdata_2020-01.csv', 'green_tripdata_2021-01.csv')
GROUP BY [result].filename()
ORDER BY [result].filename()


-- Using File Path
SELECT TOP 100
    result.filepath(1) AS result_year,
    result.filepath(2) AS result_month,
    COUNT(1) AS result_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY [result].filename(), [result].filepath(1), [result].filepath(2)
ORDER BY [result].filename(), [result].filepath(1), [result].filepath(2)


--  Filtering records based on filepaths

SELECT TOP 100
    result.filepath(1) AS result_year,
    result.filepath(2) AS result_month,
    COUNT(1) AS result_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
WHERE [result].filepath(1) = '2020'
AND [result].filepath(2) IN ('06', '07', '08')
GROUP BY [result].filepath(1), [result].filepath(2)
ORDER BY [result].filepath(1), [result].filepath(2)
